Text:
Perhaps you could help me out here...I've downloaded the torrent, overwritten the old ootp12.exe with the one included in the crack folder, and put in the serial key of 1. But it's still not working - it's telling me the serial key is the wrong one.

Any help? I'm pretty computer literate, but this has me stumped. :(

bedchair: it worked perfectly fine for me. are you sure you overwrote the file?

SoN: thanks for another good one.
Thank you again for cracking this game. I really appreciate it. I hope your hard work brings you some good karma.

Pretty sure I overwrote it. Here's exactly what i did:

Downloaded the torrent. 
Opened the folder.
Clicked on the "Crack" folder and opened it.
Dragged and dropped the "ootp12" file, and overwrote it onto the "ootp12setup" file. 
Installed the program, opened it, put in "1" for the serial number, and it tells me it's wrong, and to try again later.

What am I missing? :(

@bedchair Run ootp12setup first, and once installed the game will auto-run. Wait for the main menu to load, and exit. Then, overwrite ootp12.exe with the cracked version included in this torrent. Now run the game again and enter the serial number. Hope this helps!

Thank you for another update to this great torrent, I've already seeded at 2.000+ ratio and counting

I think I know what my problem is now. I just can't find the ootp12.exe file anywhere. Where would that even be located? I've looked for it everywhere in the files I downloaded. I feel really dumb right now. :(
Is there a crack for mac? Because .exe is obviously for windows.. Thanks in advance
